name: final_project
description: The weather forecast API is back-end application that provides the weather information  of different cities to users. In this application, user can view forecasts of all cities,  a specific one and check severe weather alerts.I choose this theme as I found this theme  extremely useful and it would be a great example how the back-end works in real world  appplications.It will provide me opportunity to experience all compoments together such  as Authenication,Authorization, Validation, Documentation and testing.
